title: Make CI reliably update diagrams and analysis on PRs
description:
## Goal
Ensure diagrams and code analysis are consistently updated as code changes, with auto-fixes applied to PRs before merge.

## Constraints
- No direct push to main (branch protection enabled)
- Solutions must work with pull requests
- Auto-fix PRs when possible

## Success Criteria
- Diagrams auto-update when code changes
- Analysis results are committed to PRs
- No manual steps required for contributors

title: Audit current CI workflows and document their purpose
description:
Review all workflows in .github/workflows/:
1. ci.yml - Main CI
2. update-diagrams.yml - Auto-update architecture diagrams
3. update-screenshots.yml - Auto-update Android screenshots
4. Any others

For each workflow document:
- Intended purpose
- Trigger conditions
- What it outputs/commits
- Current issues/gaps

title: Design PR-based auto-update strategy
description:
Design how auto-updates (diagrams, analysis) should work with PRs:

## Options to evaluate:
1. **Bot commits to PR branch** - GitHub Action pushes updates to the PR branch
2. **Separate PR from bot** - Action creates a new PR with updates, author merges
3. **Pre-merge hook** - Block merge until updates are applied
4. **Post-merge to main** - Update after merge (current approach?)

## Considerations:
- Branch protection rules
- GitHub token permissions
- Merge conflicts with concurrent PRs
- Developer experience

## Deliverable:
Document chosen approach and rationale in .agent/AGENTS.md

title: Implement diagram auto-update for PRs
description:
Make architecture diagrams automatically update when PR changes affect them.

## Requirements:
- Detect when code changes affect diagrams
- Generate updated diagrams
- Commit to PR branch (or create follow-up PR)
- Work with branch protection (no direct push to main)

## Implementation notes:
- May need GitHub App or PAT with push permissions
- Consider using `pull_request_target` trigger carefully
- Document security considerations

title: Implement code analysis auto-commit for PRs
description:
Make code analysis results (lint fixes, formatting) automatically applied to PRs.

## Requirements:
- Run analysis on PR
- Auto-fix what can be fixed (spotless, etc.)
- Commit fixes back to PR branch
- Clear feedback if manual fixes needed

## Considerations:
- Spotless already runs but doesn't auto-fix
- May need to run spotlessApply and commit
- Handle merge conflicts if PR updated while CI runs

title: Document CI architecture decisions
description:
Document why CI solutions are implemented the way they are.

## Include:
- GitHub configuration constraints (branch protection, permissions)
- Why specific triggers were chosen
- Trade-offs considered
- How to modify/extend in future

## Location:
- Add to .agent/AGENTS.md or create .agent/workflows/ci-guide.md
